external_games.name: RUGBY 18 - The British and Irish Lions 2017 Team

name: Rugby 18: The British and Irish Lions 2017 Team
summary: Slip into the prestigious jersey of the 2017 British and Irish Lions. 35 players, including Owen Farrell, Jonathan Sexton and Leigh Halfpenny, available in "Quick Match," "Online Match" and "My Squad" modes.
